revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=VIA |model=APC |revision=Paper v1 |price=100 |est_release_date=01/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=WonderMedia |cpu1_model=WM8950 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9GBG08U0B |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63DFR-H9C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (half), USB 2.0, MicroSD card slot, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=3 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI, Audio in/out (3.5mm), |stock_os=FireFox OS; |oui_eth=94:DE:80 }} :[https://apc.io/products/paper/ Product page]
*[https://github.com/apc-io/apc-rock Kernel & Bootloader source] {{see also|WonderMedia}}
===Technical Details=== *Model: VIA APC Paper *Software: Firefox OS *Chip: VIA ARM Cortex-A9 @800Mhz Processor *Memory: RAM: 512MB (DDR3), Flash: 4GB (NAND) *Graphics: Built-in 2D/3D Graphic (720p) *Input and Output: Audio out/Mic in :USB: 2x USB 2.0, microUSB (OTG) :HDMI, microSD Card Slot *Network: 1x 10/100 Ethernet *Debug: 20-pin ARM-JTAG header *Expansion: Extra GPIO, SPI, I2C *Size: 204 x 98 x 28 mm (W x H x D) *Case: Recycled pressed cardboard with high-grade aluminum
===See also=== *https://apc.io/specifications/ *[[VIA APC Paper]] *[[VIA APC Rock]] *[[VIA APC 8750]]
